greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 3 of triangle in A250104 (or A124323).
link: T. Mansour, A. O. Munagi, Set partitions with circular successions, European Journal of Combinatorics, 42 (2014), 207-216.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n, k] ((-1)^(n-k) + Sum[(-1)^(j-1) BellB[n-k-j], {j, 1, n-k}]);
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 16 2014
